research_content:
Perfect! Now I have complete information for all 12 Northeast states and DC. Here's the structured markdown output:

---

# Northeast State Veterans Affairs Offices

## New York

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | New York Department of Veterans' Services |
| **Main Office Address** | Multiple locations; Central office coordinates at 201 Varick St Room 4W59.30, New York, NY 10014 |
| **Phone** | 1-888-838-7697 (toll-free) or 212-807-3162 |
| **Website** | https://veterans.ny.gov/ |

---

## Pennsylvania

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Department of Military and Veterans Affairs (DMVA) |
| **Main Office Address** | Building 0-47, Fort Indiantown Gap, Annville, PA 17003-5002 |
| **Phone** | 1-800-547-2838 or 717-861-8910 |
| **Website** | https://www.pa.gov/agencies/dmva |

---

## New Jersey

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Department of Military and Veterans Affairs / Department of Veterans Affairs |
| **Main Office Address** | 101 Eggert Crossing Road, Lawrenceville, NJ 08648 |
| **Phone** | 973-297-3230 or 1-888-865-8387 (Veterans Benefits Hotline) |
| **Website** | https://www.nj.gov/military/veterans/ |

---

## Massachusetts

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Executive Office of Veterans Services (EOVS) |
| **Main Office Address** | 15 New Chardon Street, One Bowdoin Square, Suite 400, Boston, MA 02114 |
| **Phone** | (617) 210-5480 or 1-888-844-2838 (toll-free) |
| **Website** | https://www.mass.gov/orgs/executive-office-of-veterans-services |

---

## Connecticut

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Connecticut Department of Veterans Affairs (DVA) |
| **Main Office Address** | 287 West Street, Rocky Hill, CT 06067 |
| **Phone** | 860-616-3600 or 860-616-3685 (Office of Advocacy and Assistance) |
| **Website** | https://portal.ct.gov/dva |

---

## Rhode Island

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Office of Veterans Services |
| **Main Office Address** | 480 Metacom Avenue, Bristol, RI 02809 |
| **Phone** | (401) 253-8000 |
| **Website** | https://vets.ri.gov/ |

---

## Maine

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Bureau of Maine Veterans' Services |
| **Main Office Address** | 194 Winthrop Street, Augusta, ME 04330 |
| **Phone** | 207-287-7020 or 207-287-9933 (field offices) |
| **Website** | https://www.maine.gov/veterans/ |

---

## New Hampshire

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Department of Military Affairs and Veterans Services (Division of Veterans Services) |
| **Main Office Address** | 275 Chestnut Street, Room 517, Manchester, NH 03101-2411 |
| **Phone** | (603) 624-9230 or 1-800-622-9230 (toll-free) |
| **Website** | https://www.nhveterans.nh.gov/ |

---

## Vermont

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Office of Veterans Affairs |
| **Main Office Address** | 118 State Street, Montpelier, VT 05620-4401 |
| **Phone** | 802-828-3379 or 1-888-666-9844 (toll-free) |
| **Website** | https://veterans.vermont.gov/ |

---

## Maryland

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Department of Veterans and Military Families |
| **Main Office Address** | The Wineland Building, 4th Floor, 16 Francis Street, Annapolis, MD 21401 |
| **Phone** | 410-260-3838 or 1-866-793-1577 (toll-free) |
| **Website** | https://veterans.maryland.gov/ |

---

## Delaware

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **State Department** | Office of Veterans Services |
| **Main Office Address** | 802 Silver Lake Blvd., Suite 100, Dover, DE 19904 (Robbins Building) |
| **Phone** | (302) 739-2792 or 1-800-344-9900 (toll-free) |
| **Website** | https://vets.delaware.gov/ |

---

## Washington, DC

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Local Department** | Mayor's Office of Veterans Affairs (DC Office of Veterans Affairs) |
| **Main Office Address** | 441 4th Street, NW, Suite 707 North, Washington, DC 20001 |
| **Phone** | (202) 724-5454 |
| **Website** | https://dc.gov/agency/office-veterans-affairs |

---

**Note:** This research was completed on 2026-01-29. Contact information and organizational structures may change. It's recommended to verify current details via official websites before reaching out for services.

---

## Sources

- [New York Department of Veterans' Services](https://veterans.ny.gov/)
- [Pennsylvania Department of Military and Veterans Affairs](https://www.pa.gov/agencies/dmva)
- [New Jersey Military and Veterans Affairs](https://www.nj.gov/military/veterans/)
- [Massachusetts Executive Office of Veterans Services](https://www.mass.gov/orgs/executive-office-of-veterans-services)
- [Connecticut Department of Veterans Affairs](https://portal.ct.gov/dva)
- [Rhode Island Office of Veterans Services](https://vets.ri.gov/)
- [Maine Bureau of Veterans' Services](https://www.maine.gov/veterans/)
- [New Hampshire Department of Military Affairs and Veterans Services](https://www.nhveterans.nh.gov/)
- [Vermont Office of Veterans Affairs](https://veterans.vermont.gov/)
- [Maryland Department of Veterans and Military Families](https://veterans.maryland.gov/)
- [Delaware Office of Veterans Services](https://vets.delaware.gov/)
- [Washington DC Office of Veterans Affairs](https://dc.gov/agency/office-veterans-affairs)
